title: Pediatric Urologist, Head of the Pediatric Urology Department at the National Children's Medical Center

education.university: In 2014, he graduated from the Tashkent Pediatric Medical Institute with honors in Pediatrics. From 2014 to 2016, he completed a clinical residency in Pediatric Surgery at the Department of Faculty Pediatric Surgery of TashPMI.

details: Course in Pediatric Laparoscopic Urology at the Department of Pediatric Urology, City Hospital No. 7, Volgograd, Russia
One-year internship in Pediatric Urology at Yansan Hospital, Pusan National University, Busan, South Korea
Course in Pediatric Urology at Sinchon Severance Hospital, Yonsei University, Seoul, South Korea
Course in Pediatric Urology at Seoul National University Hospital, Seoul, South Korea
Participation in the ‘Live Surgery for Bladder Exstrophy in Children’ course, Ahmedabad, India
Participation in a Pediatric Urology workshop, Porto, Portugal
Participation in a Pediatric Urology workshop, Salzburg, Austria
Successful defense of a dissertation on hypospadias
Internship in genital surgery at Sava Memorial Hospital, Belgrade, Serbia
Participation in a Pediatric Urology workshop at Hacettepe University Hospital, Ankara, Turkey
Participation in a Pediatric Urology workshop at Cincinnati Children’s Hospital Medical Center, Cincinnati, USA

positions.description: Urologist and Department Assistant at the clinic of the Tashkent Pediatric Medical Institute.
Head of the Pediatric Urology Department at the National Children's Medical Center.
Reviewer for the Journal of Pediatric Urologists.
